text: Chisimu Firiauna jwalikwesisye pa chilambo, ni watesile achinsyene (chilambocho) kuwa mikutula-mikutula, likuga line mwa jamanjao walitondweye machili (wanache wa Israila watesile kuwa achikapolo), jwaliji nkusikita wanache wao wachilume ni kwalekaga umi wanache wao wachikongwe, chisimu jwalakwe jwaliji mwa akuwatanganya
